explanation: The stage direction describes the setting of the scene, mentioning a rural area with greenery and a character, Noellie, asleep on a grassy bench next to her guitar. This fits the definition of 'setting,' which involves stage description or play location.
stgdir: Le théâtre représente un coin de verdure, dans la campagne, Noellie est endormie sur un banc de gazon, à côté de sa guitare.
